Articles.Content:
While building my Vostok replica, I tried to clip a fairing base into the pod assembly, and on load, it started to spazz out.

I believe it was caused by the fairing base collider.

I don't think it was caused by a mod, but I do have the latest (1.0) version of KER and Hyperedit.

To reproduce:

Download this craft, and launch it.

see Fiaring base collider on KerbalX.com
